sentences.sContent: With her dying breath, Queen Dido pronounced a malediction on Aeneas and all his descendants.
sentences.sContent_eng: With her dying breath, Queen Dido pronounced a malediction on Aeneas and all his descendants.
sentences.sCn: 黛朵女王以其死前最后一口气诅咒阿尼厄斯及其子孙。

sentences.sContent: But like the movie mummies who invoke the malediction, the legend of the mummy's curse seems destined never to die.
sentences.sContent_eng: But like the movie mummies who invoke the malediction, the legend of the mummy's curse seems destined never to die.
sentences.sCn: 但是，正如电影中木乃伊召唤诅咒一样，木乃伊诅咒的传说似乎注定永存不灭。

remMethod.val: male (坏地) + dict (说) + ion (名词) → 说坏地 → 坏话

trans.tranOther: a wish that something bad will happen to someone
